Social Preview Image Guidelines:

Colors:
- Background: #1a1a1a
- Accent: #3b82f6 (Tailwind blue-500)
- Text: #ffffff

Text:
"React Clean Canvas
A pristine React starter with TypeScript & Tailwind"

Icons to include:
- 🎨 Canvas/Art palette
- ⚡️ Lightning bolt
- 🎯 Target

Font:
- Inter or SF Pro Display
- Main title: 48px
- Subtitle: 24px

Layout:
- Center aligned
- Logo/icons at the top
- Title below
- Subtitle at the bottom
